segments.text: I'm observing a peculiar scene in this kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is absolutely overflowing, water cascading over the edge onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a rather large puddle on the floor already, I can see it spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely unaware, though; she's just polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually submerged in the water, but she doesn't seem to feel a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it incredible that someone could be so absorbed in a task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully on, and the drain clearly isn't working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is going to cause significant water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her about the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch her continue without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so peaceful, yet chaos is literally at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the gushing water is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will be before she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn off that tap.
segments.speaker: PAR
